The British School of Guangzhou
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
As we approach the end of another very busy and successful school year, the Nord Anglia Education family of schools, of which we are a member, would like to invite you to take part in a parent satisfaction survey.
It should only take a few minutes of your time to complete and we very much value your opinion on how you feel we have served your family this academic year.
To take part, please click the appropriate link below any time before 9th June 2014.
